mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (b_no, b_title, b_content, user_id, re_group) values (#{b_no}, #{b_title}, #{b_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_id}, #{b_no})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_board
order by re_group desc, re_seq asc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

choose.when: where b_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or b_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where b_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or b_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
